com.huguesjohnson.hapsby.SaveGamePropert.name: Scroll length
com.huguesjohnson.hapsby.SaveGamePropert.description:
Scroll length.

Screen will be updated after changing rooms.

Warning: total WILL roll back to zero.

com.huguesjohnson.hapsby.SaveGamePropert.name: Faries
com.huguesjohnson.hapsby.SaveGamePropert.description:
Number of faries collected.

Screen will be updated after changing rooms.

Warning: total WILL roll back to zero.

com.huguesjohnson.hapsby.SaveGamePropert.name: Lives
com.huguesjohnson.hapsby.SaveGamePropert.description:
Number of lives.

Screen will be updated after changing rooms.

Warning: total WILL roll back to zero.

com.huguesjohnson.hapsby.SaveGameDefinit.gameDescription:
FCE Ultra save state for Solomon's Key.

Changes will not be seen until you change rooms.
